span.strong: Spring Driver's Education - Cancelled (may consider late Summer/Fall session)
May 7: Kindergarten Graduation and Elementary Track and Field Day - Cancelled

a.title: Go to comments for 2020 District 11C Basketball Tournament Brackets

p.span: At our Board Meeting last night (April 8, 2020), our Trustees and administration decided to continue with remote learning through the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year. Please see the attached letter (found HERE) from our Board of Trustees. Thank you!

a.title: Go to comments for Remote Learning Through Remainder of the Year
Go to comments for Notice of Election 2020

span.strong: Governor Bullock has extended the school closure order through April 24th. We will continue with remote learning.

p.span: Hi Parents ~ There will NOT be a material drop off or pick up on Monday, April 6th. The teachers prepared two weeks of lessons for last week's drop off so it's not necessary. If you have specific questions about materials, please contact your child's teacher. Communication about the next pick up and drop off will be sent at the end of next week. We hope everyone remains healthy and safe! Thank you!

Our Shields Valley School District cooks are preparing student meals for Mondays - Thursdays during our remote learning. Please email or call Mr. Sager or Mrs. Taylor if your child needs lunch. We can start anytime with meals and delivery. You are welcome to pay online the same as during the school year.
Monday, March 30th Material Drop Off Arrangements - Click HERE

span.p: Governor Bullock has issued a Stay At Home order this evening and our District is making new arrangements to Monday's pick up and drop off plan to ensure everyone's health remains the top priority.

The buildings will not be open for pick ups and drop offs for the next two Mondays. Instead, we are working with Harlow's Bussing to schedule deliveries of these materials through our regular routes. We still have details to figure out; however, you will be able to return materials and get new materials at your normal bus pick up locations. Times will be modified, so please watch for an email with these scheduled delivery times. This email will be sent out by Saturday evening. We will also be delivering to those students living in town.
Thank you for your patience and understanding!

span.strong: Governor Steve Bullock has ordered all schools closed in Montana. We will be in further communication soon. Please continue to monitor your email and this website. Thank you!

p.span: March 16, 2020 Parent and Family Communication Letter.

Our staff members have been in meetings this morning. You will receive updated communication by the end of the day. That communication will be posted here and sent via email. Thank you for your patience and understanding. 3.16.20
